home.title: TalkCaddy
home.gps_hint: Enable GPS and start talking to your caddie
home.location_required_message: TalkCaddy needs access to your location to calculate distances and record your shots during the round.
home.no_gps_warning: Without GPS you won't be able to see distances or record your shot locations.

rate_popup.title: Would you have 15 seconds to rate us?
rate_popup.description: It's fast and very helpful! Thanks!

welcome.title: Your voice caddie
welcome.subtitle:
Play without a scorecard, without writing anything.
Just talk. I'll take care of the rest.

app_purpose.title: What is this app for?
app_purpose.bullet_1: Allows TalkCaddy to follow you on the course
app_purpose.bullet_3: Syncs your round and your shots
app_purpose.key_message:
You don't need to use the app during the round.
Just talk to TalkCaddy.

location_permission.title: We need your location
location_permission.reassurance: Not used outside of the round.

complete.title: All set
complete.subtitle: Go back to the chat and say:

signin.title: Connect your caddie
signin.subtitle: Your account syncs your round and course GPS.

signup.title: Create account
signup.subtitle: Your account syncs your round and course GPS.
signup.error_message: This email already exists or is invalid

recover_password.title: Recover password
recover_password.email_subtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a verification code
recover_password.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
recover_password.success_subtitle: Your password has been updated. Sign in with your new password.

rounds.title: My rounds
rounds.empty: You don't have any rounds yet
rounds.empty_hint: Start a round to see your history here

settings.title: Settings
settings.disconnect_confirm: Are you sure you want to disconnect?

select_course.title: Select the course
select_course.gps_tracking_description: Measure distances to green and hazards
select_course.gps_too_far: GPS disabled: you're {distance} from the course
select_course.gps_too_far_error: GPS only works when you're near the course
select_course.no_course_found_hint: Make sure you're at a golf course or try again

browse_courses.title: Select another course
browse_courses.location_permission_hint: Allow location access to see nearby courses, or use the search
browse_courses.empty_recent_hint: Courses you play will appear here
browse_courses.login_required: Sign in to see your recent courses

round_in_progress.title: Round in progress
round_in_progress.exit_message: Your progress will be saved and you can continue later.
round_in_progress.finish_message: Once finished, you won't be able to edit the results.
round_in_progress.round_finished_externally: Round was finished from the voice caddy

active_round.title: You have a round in progress
active_round.message: You left an unfinished round at $courseName.

feedback.title: Send feedback
feedback.subtitle: Your feedback helps us improve TalkCaddy
feedback.error_message: Could not send your message. Please try again.
feedback.success_message: Thank you for your feedback. We will respond shortly.

tracking.permission_message: To track your route while using other apps, TalkCaddy needs background location access.
tracking.permission_denied: Without background location access, GPS will only work while the app is open.

bag.title: My bag
bag.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete "$clubName"?

intro.title: Your Voice Caddy
intro.subtitle: TalkCaddy uses ChatGPT's voice mode as your personal caddy.
intro.bullet_2: Log shots without touching your phone
intro.bullet_3: Get club recommendations based on your game

prerequisites.title: Before we start
prerequisites.subtitle: You'll need the ChatGPT app with voice mode.
prerequisites.hint: Voice mode works best with ChatGPT Plus, but free tier has limited voice too

connect.title: Connect your voice caddy
connect.subtitle: We'll open ChatGPT with your personal caddy ready to go.
connect.step_1: Tap "Sign in" when asked to connect your TalkCaddy account
connect.manual_step_2: Tap "Explore GPTs" at the bottom left
connect.manual_step_4: Open and sign in when prompted

waiting.title: Waiting for connection...
waiting.subtitle: Complete the sign-in in ChatGPT, then come back here.

success.title: Voice Caddy Connected
success.subtitle: You're all set. One last thing:
success.tip: To talk to your caddy, tap the headphone icon in ChatGPT
success.example: Try saying: "Hey, what can you help me with on the course?"

error.not_completed_subtitle: It looks like the sign-in wasn't completed in ChatGPT.
error.why_needed: The voice caddy needs access to your TalkCaddy account to know your location and club distances.

home_card.not_connected_subtitle: Connect ChatGPT to talk to your caddy hands-free
home_card.connected_subtitle: Open ChatGPT and tap the headphone icon to start

forgotten_round.notification_body: Your round has been active for {hours} hours
forgotten_round.dialog_body: Your round at {courseName} has been active for a while.
